name: casein
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a protein (= a substance found in food that is necessary for the body to grow) found in milk and cheese, also used to make a type of paint: Casein or milk protein is added to some breads and cereals.
More examplesFewer examplesMany butter substitutes contain milk derivatives such as whey powder or casein.The caseins, the major family of milk proteins, are largely unaffected by pasteurization.Casein can be applied as thin as watercolor or as opaque as gouache, and it dries relatively quickly.Casein paint has long been available to artists, but its use diminished with the promotion of acrylic painting in the 1950s and 1960s.
